node.name: Eclipse NetRexx
node.shortdescription:
Eclipse NetRexx version 2.0.3 (Alpha) is now available.
The NetRexx editor provides full dynamic syntax and semantic error checking.
Extensive syntax coloring options are provided.
An outline view is provided.
NetRexx programs may be run interpretively, translated to Java or compiled to java classes via one-click menu selection or keyboard shortcut.
node.body:
Eclipse NetRexx version 2.0.3 (Alpha) is now available.
The NetRexx editor provides full dynamic syntax and semantic error checking.
Extensive syntax coloring options are provided.
An outline view is provided.
NetRexx programs may be run interpretively, translated to Java or compiled to java classes via one-click menu selection or keyboard shortcut.
